content: hobbii pattern no 1001-171-3999 a wonderful crocheted makeup bag in a beautiful and simple pattern decide which rainbow 8/4 colors you like the best and get started on your own makeup bag happy crocheting **materials ** − crochet hook size 4 mm / us g/6 − rainbow cotton 8/4 1 work with 2 strands 186 yards 170 meters 50 grams 1 76 ounces − zipper 25 cm − 20 cm 7 9 leather string optionally **measurements ** 23 x 14 cm 9x5 5 inches **usage ** approx 90 g **abbreviations ** **chain** chain stitch **st** stitch **single_crochet** single_crochet **lsc** long single_crochet **slip_stitch** slip_stitch german https //hobbii de/gehakeltes-kosmetiktaschchen 1 https //hobbii com/rainbow-cotton-8-4 utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=product&utm_content=rainbow84&utm_term=swr 2 https //hobbii de/gehakeltes-kosmetiktaschchen
